attributes.action: Intervene in the proposed congestion charge banding by the Mayor of London.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The mayor is toiling with the idea to bring in a banding structure for London banding vehicles under certain categories, which in itself is not such a bad idea. I myself as a builder drive a Transit type van, this he proposes to set in the same banding as 4x4 jeeps which currently stands as the highest levy, rumour has it around £80.00. Now this is criminal, ok I agree with regards to the big 4x4 driving around the centre of London and there is no need for it but innocent people who are trying to earn a living will end up paying, how can I add these charges to my already cut throat industry ? .
